data.text: @conspiracymill I don't know what makes me more sad…the lengths people go to to prevent coming down with a cold (while denying care and compassion to a loved one) or the public confession of those efforts suggesting an underlying need for validation.
@lowfreqfilms @conspiracymill But it isn’t always the case
@lowfreqfilms @conspiracymill I have heard this same story a few times where the wife never even gets sick.

@conspiracymill My story is similar to hers except no one Had the V. Kids never tested at all and never had a symptom (they are both under 10) I never tested + at all and hubby did get fairly sick. We did isolate from hubby but that was it. We kept windows open to increase airflow.
@conspiracymill I'm so glad I'm unvaccinated if this is the shit triple vaxxed people go through. lol
